uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.exec

Interface ExecService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AppContextCleanup, AppContextService<ExecService>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultExecService

    public interface ExecService
extends AppContextService<ExecService>
    A service to run external commands. This is encapsulated as a service to allow substitution in tests and to re-use common code. If a command contains colons then it is assumed to denote a remote command to be run through ssh and be of the form: [username@host:]+command If there is more than one username@host fragment then all but the last denote a series of jump-hosts
